data.name: NamespaceCannotBeAdded
data.value: Namespace can not be added in this destination.

data.name: CannotMakeExplicit
data.value: Only attributes, expressions or statements can be made explicit

data.name: Event1
data.value: <event>

data.name: Handler
data.value: <handler>

data.name: ExpressionToConvert
data.value: The expression to be evaluated and converted.

data.name: NameOfTypeToConvert
data.value: The name of the data type to which the value of expression will be converted.

data.name: Expression1
data.value: <expression>

data.name: Typename
data.value: <typeName>

data.name: AssociatesAnEvent
data.value: Associates an event with an event handler, delegate or lambda expression at run time.

data.name: EventToAssociate
data.value: The event to associate an event handler, delegate or lambda expression with.

data.name: EventHandlerToAssociate
data.value: The event handler to associate with the event. This may take the form of { AddressOf <eventHandler> | <delegate> | <lambdaExpression> }.

data.name: ExpressionEvalReturns
data.value: If <expression> evaluates to a reference or Nullable value that is not Nothing, the function returns that value. Otherwise, it calculates and returns <expressionIfNothing>.

data.name: ReturnedIfINotNothing
data.value: Returned if it evaluates to a reference or nullable type that is not Nothing.

data.name: ReturnedIfNothing
data.value: Evaluated and returned if <expression> evaluates to Nothing.

data.name: ExpressionIfNothing
data.value: <expressionIfNothing>

data.name: ReturnsConvertResult
data.value: Returns the result of explicitly converting an expression to a specified data type.

data.name: IntroducesTypeConversion
data.value: Introduces a type conversion operation similar to CType. The difference is that CType succeeds as long as there is a valid conversion, whereas DirectCast requires that one type inherit from or implement the other type.

data.name: TypeToReturnObjectFor
data.value: The type name to return a System.Type object for.

data.name: ReturnsSystemTypeObject
data.value: Returns a System.Type object for the specified type name.

data.name: XMLNSToReturnObjectFor
data.value: The XML namespace prefix to return a System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace object for. If this is omitted, the object for the default XML namespace is returned.

data.name: XmlNamespacePrefix
data.value: <xmlNamespacePrefix>

data.name: ReturnsXNamespaceObject
data.value: Returns the System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace object corresponding to the specified XML namespace prefix.

data.name: ReplacesChars
data.value: Replaces a specified number of characters in a String variable with characters from another string.

data.name: NameOfStringVariable
data.value: The name of the string variable to modify.

data.name: OneBasedStartPos
data.value: The one-based character position in the string where the replacement of text begins.

data.name: NumberOfCharsToReplace
data.value: The number of characters to replace. If omitted, the length of <stringExpression> is used.

data.name: StringName
data.value: <stringName>

data.name: StartIndex
data.value: <startIndex>

data.name: Length
data.value: <length>

data.name: StringExpression
data.value: <stringExpression>

data.name: ConvertsToDataType
data.value: Converts an expression to the {0} data type.

data.name: RemovesEventAssociation
data.value: Removes the association between an event and an event handler or delegate at run time.

data.name: EventToDisassociate
data.value: The event to disassociate an event handler or delegate from.

data.name: EventHandlerToDisassociate
data.value: The event handler to disassociate from the event. This may take the form of { AddressOf <eventHandler> | <delegate> }.

data.name: IfConditionReturnsResults
data.value: If <condition> returns True, the function calculates and returns <expressionIfTrue>. Otherwise, it returns <expressionIfFalse>.

data.name: ExpressionToEvaluate
data.value: The expression to evaluate.

data.name: EvaluatedAndReturnedIfTrue
data.value: Evaluated and returned if <condition> evaluates to True.

data.name: EvaluatedAndReturnedIfFalse
data.value: Evaluated and returned if <condition> evaluates to False.

data.name: Condition
data.value: <condition>

data.name: ExpressionIfTrue
data.value: <expressionIfTrue>

data.name: ExpressionIfFalse
data.value: <expressionIfFalse>

data.name: IntroducesSafeTypeConversion
data.value: Introduces a type conversion operation that does not throw an exception. If an attempted conversion fails, TryCast returns Nothing, which your program can test for.

data.name: NodeDoesNotDescendFromRoot
data.value: Node does not descend from root.

data.name: NodeNotInParentsChildList
data.value: Node not in parent's child list

data.name: TriviaIsNotAssociatedWithToken
data.value: Trivia is not associated with token
